channel.title: Crafting on This is Jack Salici
channel.description: Recent content in Crafting on This is Jack Salici

item.title: LACK OF DRAWERS.
item.description: I modded my Ikea Table 3d printing some stuffs.

item.title: Ear saver against mask pain.
item.description: During the Covid-19 emergency, with the aim of reduce the ear pain caused by wearing the mask for several hours, I designed this ear saver that can be 3d printed in a few minutes.

item.title: A scout model.
item.description: During my last year as a boy scout, I’ve achieve the craftman badge and as test I had to reproduce a 1:20 scale model of a patrol area during the campouts.
